summary: A bunch of 7 orphan cavemen grow up on a little island all by themselves. After a fire burns all vegetation they set out to find a new place to live. Here, one day they trap a strange ... See full summary »
cast: Senta Berger|Giuliano Gemma|Frank Wolff|Renzo Montagnani|Lino Toffolo|Francesco Mulè|Aldo Giuffrè|Paola Borboni|Lando Buzzanca|Gabriella Giorgelli|Gina Mascetti
keywords: small island|cannibal|brother brother relationship|captured woman|woman with a tail
title: Cuando las mujeres tenían cola
